title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 328/91 of 11 February 1991 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1517/77 fixing the list of the various groups of hop varieties cultivated in the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 328/91  of 11 February 1991  amending Regulation (EEC) No 1517/77 fixing the list of the various groups of hop varieties cultivated in the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 1517/77 is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.  Article 2
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from the 1990 harvest.   This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 February 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission   (1) OJ No L 175, 4. 8. 1971, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 23. (3) OJ No L 169, 7. 7. 1977, p. 13. (4) OJ No L 360, 9. 12. 1989, p. 23.
